sentences.english: Eg. Mary didn't want to get involved in any perplexed relationship with a married man.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗不願扯入與已婚男人糾纏不清的關係中。

sentences.english: Others became entangled in the debate.
sentences.chinese: 其他人在這場爭論中糾纏不清。

sentences.english: Are your tables all tangled up?
sentences.chinese: 是你的表中的所有糾纏不清呢？

sentences.english: Talk people tend to fall into a non-trivial quarrel in the long-winded.
sentences.chinese: 議論別人往往陷入雞毛蒜皮的是非口舌中糾纏不清。

sentences.english: Talking about others will make your trapped in ravelment by trifiles.
sentences.chinese: 議論別人往往陷入雞毛蒜皮的是非口舌中糾纏不清。

sentences.english: Alcohol has a peculiar relationship to happiness.
sentences.chinese: 酒和幸福有着糾纏不清的關係。

sentences.english: And humans will be ever more intricately linked with their environment.
sentences.chinese: 人類與環境的聯繫會更加絲絲縷縷，糾纏不清。
